item.title: Help With Admin Spawning PI. Will Repp++!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Make a isAdmin() boolean

public boolean isAdmin() {
    if (c.playerRights == 3) {
        return true;
    }
return false;
}

Then make a command like

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("pring") {
    c.getItems().addItem(PRINGID, 1);
}

Then make a itemId system in your ::item command (Figure this out ur self)
And in the command be like

if (itemId == PRINGID) {
c.sendMessage("Nope.");
}

LOL Kinda complex. could make it simpler.

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Admin Spawning PI. Will Repp++!
